product.longDescription: An heirloom with unique, narrow, tongue-shaped leaves. Pointed, buttery leaves have a crunchy rib and excellent flavor. Slow to bolt. MT0-30. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 435,000 seeds/lb. Packet: 500 seeds.
